lead_paragraph: Kennedy Igboananike scored early in the second half and the Chicago Fire beat the 10-man Philadelphia Union 1-0 on Saturday in blustery conditions.

headline.print_headline: Igboananike Scores Early in 2nd Half; Fire Beat 10-Man Union
headline.main: Igboananike Scores Early in 2nd Half; Fire Beat 10-Man Union
